name: cacls - Grant permission to specified user or group recursively
description:
Modifies the filesystem permissions of the specified folder and contents to allow the specified user or group Full Control. If "Access is denied"
is displayed it may be because the file or folder doesn't exit. Run the prereq command to create it. Upon successfull execution, "Successfully processed 3 files"
will be displayed.

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Test requrires a file to modify to be located at (#{file_or_folder})

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: Test requrires a file to modify to be located at (#{file_or_folder})

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Test requrires a file to modify to be located at (#{file_or_folder})

input_arguments.name: user_or_group
input_arguments.description: User or group to allow full control

input_arguments.name: file_or_folder
input_arguments.description: Path of the file or folder to change permissions.
